评论概述: Cute but runs big — Prepare for slow shipping
评论详情: So, my daughter ordered several items here for part of her back to school wardrobe. For the price point, I wasn’t expecting department store quality, but I admit this particular top had us pleasantly surprised. The fabric and stitching are of decent quality and it looks as advertised. The fit runs big, specifically in the arm/shoulders — and yes, as others have mentioned, it IS transparent (nothing a cute cami underneath won’t fix). The GRIPE: this seller is a drop-shipper and the items are actually coming from China. That is not a problem in of itself, except that isn’t mentioned anywhere within the listing and when checking out, Amazon gives the arrival window of 3-5 days from purchase. That was not the case, and tracking the packages was a hassle, since it gives you a bogus origin scan (Jamaica, NY). I managed to find a Reddit thread with a site you can actually track these misleading tracking scans, which revealed the packages’ actual shipping origin location was China; hence the long delivery time. Just something I would have appreciated a little transparency on. Also, we were charged separate shipping charges for each individual item purchased (3 items = over $21 in shipping alone) — in hindsight that probably should have clued me in, but my daughter really wanted these tops. All in all, she’s keeping 2 of the 3 ordered, as only 1 of them was disappointing and hopefully the return process runs much smoother than the delivery. The packages that arrived all had a NJ return address and the return label I printed off through Amazon has it going to CA … geesh!
The material is thinner and more delicate than expected, but it is beautiful. My daughter loves it. I just wish it weren’t so delicate.

评论概述: Whole body of shirt is see through lace
评论详情: This isn't a terrible shirt but it isn't great quality either. The Amazon photos looked like it was lined through the torso area but it's entirely see through so be prepared for that.  The lace is ok: decently soft, not scratchy, but not much stretch or suppleness. The size is accurate; it doesn't run inordinately large or undersized. I am wearing a small and have a 33" chest and 25" waist. It fits like a standard small.  It's not uncomfortable. It doesn't look bad on. It's cute. Wish it was a tad higher quality but for the current price, it's ok.

评论概述: Love the design of this top.  Order your usual size.
评论详情: I ordered the ’S-white’ version with the cap sleeves, ruffles, button front and pin tucking.  This top is made of 95% polyester & 5% spandex but there’s no stretch in the fabric.  It actually feels like light cotton cloth with an embroidered floral eyelet pattern. The construction is good and the stitching is precisely sewn with finished seams.  The buttons are cloth covered so they’re somewhat difficult to get through the button holes.  The bust area is lined providing full coverage.  The sleeves and back neckline have elastic (See photo). This top can be machine washed cold and hung to dry.I’m 5’4” tall, 117 pounds with a 36.5 inch bust and 26.5 inch waist.  I usually wear size small or petite 6.  There wasn’t a size chart for this product so I ordered size medium since the top looked like it may have been designed for juniors.  Unfortunately, it’s too big all over and I should have stuck with small.  My advice is to order your usual size for this topUPDATE 1/27/24I machine washed in warm water and tumble dried this shirt using medium heat.  It shrunk considerably so that size medium fits through the body.  When I wear it with the buttons in the front, it pooches out on the upper back which looks odd.  The shirt fits considerably better with the buttons in the back.  The sleeves are still too long so size small would have been a better choice for me.  Wash in cold water and hang to dry if you want to avoid shrinkage.
